ACCOUNT TYPE 
Basic Account
  Basic accounts can post comments, track purchase histories, and more!
Event Producer
  Use this account type to create events, sell tickets, and register attendees.
Affiliate
  Use your Affiliate Account to drive traffic to Brown Paper Tickets and you'll get paid for the tickets you help us sell.
Developer
  Developer accounts can be used to create applications using the Brown Paper Tickets API.
Open Ticket Network
  Sell tickets through your retail location using our Open Ticket Network.
Media
  Members of the media can be the first to find out about new events and receive free tickets.


Information you enter here is protected by a secure, encrypted connection.
